nonNegativeNumber: {{field}} must be greater than or equal to zero
passwordMinLength: Password must contain at least {{minLength}} characters
passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
passwordLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number
passwordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character
invalidUrlFormat: Invalid URL. Use only http://, https:// or mailto: links
inProgressRequiresFields: To set status to "IN PROGRESS" you need to select: {{missingFields}}
budgetPositive: Budget must be a positive number
endDateAfterStart: End date must be equal to or after start date
startBeforeEnd: Start date must be before end date
